effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Defense Curl Gen I: Skull Bash)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Aerial Ace to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
素早い　動きで
相手を　ほんろうして　切りつける。
攻撃は　必ず　命中する。

The user confounds the target with
speed, then slashes.
This attack never misses.

Chi la usa attacca il nemico a grande velocità.
Questa mossa è infallibile.

Quien lo usa ataca con una descarga eléctrica y
puede utilizar la electricidad restante para subir
su Ataque Especial.

Der Anwender irritiert das Ziel durch
Schnelligkeit, bevor er angreift.
Diese Attacke trifft ihr Ziel immer.

Le lanceur prend l’ennemi de vitesse et le lacère.
N’échoue jamais.

재빠른 움직임으로
상대를 농락해 벤다.
공격은 반드시 명중한다.

すばやい　うごきで　ほんろうする。
こうげきは　かならず　あいてに
めいちゅうする。

The user confounds the target
with speed, then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.

The user confounds the target
with speed, then slashes.
The attack lands without fail.

Le lanceur prend l’ennemi de vitesse
et le lacère. N’échoue jamais.

The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.

The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.

The user confounds the foe with speed,
then strikes. The attack lands without
fail.

An extremely fast
attack against one
target. It can’t be
evaded.

An extremely fast
attack that can’t
be avoided.

An extremely fast
attack that can’t
be avoided.
